attributes.action: work with Ford to help them find the £100 million they claim is needed to prevent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the production of the iconic SWB Transit Van, described as the "Backbone of Britain", from being off-shored to Turkey with further loss of UK manufacturing jobs.
The Southampton Transit Plant is a signifcant contributor to the local economy, the Treasury and through it's exports, the UK's Balance of Trade.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "work with Ford to help them find the £100 million they claim is needed to prevent."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18683


Prime Minister's Office
